website_summaries.verdict: Gallon-sized container of bed bug killer formulated with active ingredient Permethrin, ideal for travelers.
pros: Travelers can use this product to protect their luggage from picking up bed bugs at hotels, a common issue
Kills on contact, can also treat lice, fleas, ticks, clothes moths, carpet beetles, and pantry pests
cons: Unfortunately, some bed bug populations can develop a resistance to Permethrin

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. It is definitely not an orderless product either very strong scent. I recommend leaving the area with windows open or good ventilation. Still saw bugs couple hours after application!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen S

customer_reviews.title: Not a fast kill or deterrent for bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t see results quickly enough, after direct contact bugs were still moving along. Also did not deter them at all. I got bit twice on a mattress I sprayed one hour prior to laying on. I went with DE after I used all this. Worked on ants tho.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Bug spray
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work well at all in fact think it made the bugs try to get revenge on me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as higher priced alternatives
customer_reviews.text: This worked just as good as the higher priced alternatives. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to brother to use, along with their diatomaceous earth stuff I think they're gone, for now.
customer_reviews.author: J Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Will not waste my money on this prduct. Could have used tap water and achieved same results, You can buy a lot of water for the $50 Bucks I donated to the Bonide company.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McKee

customer_reviews.title: Fast knock down
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I got more than a friend's visit several days ago! I found bugs! Never had them before! I sprayed thoroughly after her visit, then again four days later. Killed all visible insects. Sprayed cracks and crevices too! Hatching takes about 5 days. Will spray again even though product continues working for up to 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Safety1st

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I found something that finally worked. I spent a lot of money with bedbug supply and there spray products don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Blabagno

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Bedbugs!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! Totally outperforms Ortho bedbug spray. I sprayed 2 times and the bedbugs are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Raffoul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Product! Keeps all Bugs, and Spiders, out of the Bed Room!
customer_reviews.author: Gary V. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for do it yourselfers
customer_reviews.text: Why pay for an exterminator, when you can do it yourself. (watch out this product is really potent) I originally used the oil based which is not as strong, bur kills the vermin for a much longer time, but now with the kids I use the water based which is stronger but dries out much faster, I spray the bedrooms (about once a month or whenever we see vermin or cockroaches) in the morning, and the kitchen at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: No bugs, since using this product. Easy to use. Strong odor but it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Kchaney

product_meta.title: Bonide (BND574) - Bed Bug Killer, Ready to Use Insecticide/Pesticide Bedbug Spray (1 gal.)
product_meta.description: Bonide, gallon, ready to use, bed bug Killer, excellent, long lasting control of bed bugs, great for travelers who want to protect their Luggage from insect pick up at hotels, also kills Lice, fleas, ticks, clothes, moths, & carpet beetles & pantry pest.
feature_bullets: INSECT KILLER - Our pest control kills bedbugs, lice, fleas, ticks, clothes moths, carpet beetles, cockroaches, ants, silverfish, spiders, scorpions, millipedes, & more.
INDOOR USE - This product is designed for indoor spot applications only. Not for broadcast use. Great for use on mattresses, baseboards, furniture, shelves, pet beds, molding, closets, & more.

PROTECT YOUR LUGGAGE - Bedbug Killer protects travel luggage from "pick-up" of bedbugs & other listed insects. Simply spray the outer and inner surfaces of luggage with a light spray mist of our pest defender.
LONG-LASTING RESULTS - Bed Bug Killer's fast-acting formula kills on contact and keeps working for up to 4 weeks.
READY TO USE - This product is conveniently ready to use when it arrives. The spray nozzle makes this product easy to deploy.
